ingredients: 4 to 5 cups (640 to 800 grams) cubed assorted vegetables (see suggested variations beneath the recipe)
1 tablespoon (2 grams) finely chopped fresh oregano
3 cups (780 grams) simple tomato sauce or béchamel sauce (recipe follows)
1 box lasagna noodles or 1 batch homemade lasagna noodles
